item.title: The dumb Internet of Things
item.description: The Internet of Things (IoT) is the trending buzz word in the field of computing today. Going by the dictionary, IoT is a collective name given to pieces of hardware, varying in size and power, from different corners of the world to the one large entity: The Internet. IoT is …
item.dc:creator: skamath

item.title: The Mandatory Hello World.
item.description: Hey there. If it was not evident from my landing page, I am Sachin S Kamath. To begin with, I am 19 years old and do a lot more than an engineering student should be doing in his/her age. I take pride in saying I am a gamer, cyber-security …
item.dc:creator: skamath
